title: The Living north
creator_credit: Neil Howe, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Surveys the potential of the Northern Territory, depicting its industries such as mining, fisheries, beef cattle and pearling and studying developments in transport, education and housing.
